compass.description:
Bussola: ruota la vista.
Giroscopio interno: movimento libero.
Doppio click: reset della vista.
Il movimento libero si può avere anche tenendo premuto il tanto CTRL della tastiera mentre con il mouse si trascina la mappa.
compass.title: Clicca e trascina per ruotare la camera

AR.title: Experimental Feature: Augmented Reality
AR.experimentalFeatureMessage:
Augmented Reality mode is currently in beta. This mode is only designed for use on the latest high end mobile devices.

WARNING: This mode can consume a lot of data, please be mindful of data usage charges from your network provider.

The accuracy of this mode depends on the accuracy of your mobile devices internal compass.
AR.manualAlignmentMessage:
Align your mobile device so that it corresponds with the maps current alignment, then click the blinking compass. If no landmarks to align with are currently visible on the map, you can move the map using drag and pinch actions until a recognisable landmark is visible before aligning the device with the map.
{{img}}

Tip: The sun or moon are often good landmarks to align with if you are in a location you aren't familiar with (be careful not to look at the sun - it can hurt your eyes).
AR.resetAlignmentMessage:
Resetting to compass alignment. If the alignment doesn't match the real world try waving your device in a figure 8 motion to recalibrate device. This can be done at any time.

Avoid locations with magnetic fields or metal objects as these may disorient the devices compass.

story.message: <2>Questo è l'editor di Storie</2><1>Crea e condividi Storie interattive direttamente dalla mappa<1><0><0></0>Inizia </0></1></1>
story.promptHtml1: <0>Cliccando qui è possibile vedere e creare Storie in qualsiasi momento.</0>
story.promptHtml2: <0><0>INTRODUZIONE</0><1>Storie</1><2> Crea e condividi Storie interattive direttamente dalla mappa.</2></0>

satelliteGuidance.menuTitle: You can access map guides at any time by looking in the <0>help menu</0>.
satelliteGuidance.bodyI: A super-quick guide to getting the most out of historical satellite imagery.
satelliteGuidance.bodyII: You may need to adjust your zoom level to make satellite imagery visible on the map.
satelliteGuidance.bodyIII: In your data workbench, click on the capture date dropdown and select from available times to load historical imagery.
satelliteGuidance.bodyIV: Satellite imagery may not always be available at your preferred time and location. If you only want to view imagery for a particular location, click ‘filter by location’ in your data workbench.
satelliteGuidance.titleV: How do I view false-colour imagery?
satelliteGuidance.bodyV: You can apply a range of styles, such as false-colour, to satellite imagery by clicking on the styles dropdown in your data workbench.

addData.webFile: <0>Step 2:</0> Inserisci l'URL del file remoto o del servizio web

addData.note: <0>Note: </0>I layer caricati in questo modo non possono essere condivisi con altri.

preview.doesNotContainGeospatialData: Il file non contiene dati utilizzabili.

description.name: Descrizione
description.dataLocal: Questo è un file locale. Per condividerlo è necessario pubblicarlo in modo che sia raggiungibile via web.
description.dataNotLocal: Contatta il provider dei dati per maggiori informazioni, include informazioni su diritti e condizioni d'uso.
description.wms: Questo è un <0>WMS</0>, genera immagini della mappa su richiesta. Può essere usato in un software GIS tramite l'URL:
description.wfs: Questo è un <0>WFS</0>, trasmette dati geospaziali in formato vettoriale su richiesta. Può essere usato in un software GIS tramite l'URL:
description.useLinkBelow: Usa il link per scaricare i dati. Vedi {{link}} per maggiori informazioni sui parametri del'URL per le query.
description.downloadInFormat: Scarica i dati selezionati in formato {{format}}
description.downloadNotSupported: Sfortunatamente il browser non supporta il download di questi dati. Riprovare con Chrome, Firefox o Safari.
description.useTheLinkToDownload: Usa il linlk per scaricare i dati.

terriaViewer.slowWebGLAvailableMessage: Il browser ha problemi di performance nell'uso di {{appName}} in modalità 3D, quindi sarà limitato alla modalità 2D. Per la modalità 3D prova ad usare un diverso browser, aggiornare i driver della scheda video, o il sistema operativo.
terriaViewer.slowWebGLAvailableMessageII: {{appName}} necessità di un browser con {{webGL}} ad esempio l'ultima versione di {{chrome}}, {{firefox}}, {{safari}} e {{internetExplorer}}. Il browser sembra non supportare WebGL, quindi sarà limitato alla modalità 2D.
terriaViewer.webGLNotSupportedOrSlowTitle: WebGL not supportato o troppo lento
terriaViewer.webGLNotSupportedOrSlowMessage: Il browser non può mostrare la mappa in 3D, o perchè non supporta WebGL o perchè WebGL sta girando troppo lentamente. Prova con un browser differente, ad esempio l'ultima versione di {{chrome}}, {{firefox}}, {{safari}}, {{internetExplorer}}. In qualche caso potrebbe essere necessario aggiornare i driver della scheda video o il sistema operativo per riuscire ad usare la modalità 3D di {{appName}}.

analytics.nothingSelected: Non è stato selezionato nulla, usa i bottoni per effettuare una selezione.
analytics.selectPoint: Seleziona un punto cliccando sulla mappa.
analytics.shiftToDrawRectangle: Premi il tasto SHIFT della tastiera ed il tasto sinistro del mouse per disegnare un rettangolo

dataUri.errorTitle: Il browser non supporta il download del layer
dataUri.errorMessage: Sfortunatamente i browser Microsoft (inclusi Internet Explorer ed Edge) non supportano la funzionalità che permette di scaricare i layer come file. Per farlo occorre copiare il seguente uri in un altro browser, ad esempio Chrome, Firefox o Safari: {{href}}

abs.name: ABS.Stat
abs.itemNotAvailableMessage:
An error occurred while invoking {{methodName}} on the ABS ITT server.

This error may indicate that the item you opened is temporarily unavailable or there is a problem with your internet connection. Try opening the group again, and if the problem persists, please report it by sending an email to {{email}}.
abs.unexpectedFormtMessage:
An error occurred while invoking GetGenericData on the ABS ITT server: the data format has changed.

Please report this error by sending an email to {{email}}.
abs.dataMergeErrorMessage:
An error occurred while invoking GetGenericData on the ABS ITT server: the individual data files cannot be merged.

Please report this error by sending an email to {{email}}.
abs.groupNotAvailableMessage:
An error occurred while invoking GetCodeListValue on the ABS ITT server.

This error may indicate that the group you opened is temporarily unavailable or there is a problem with your internet connection. Try opening the group again, and if the problem persists, please report it by sending an email to {{email}}.

userData.addingDataErrorMessage: The specified data could not be added because it is invalid or does not have the expected format.
userData.fileApiNotSupportedMessage: Sorry, your web browser does not support the File API, which {{appName}} requires in order to add data from a file on your system.  Please upgrade your web browser.  For the best experience, we recommend {{internetExplorer}} or the latest version of {{chrome}} or {{firefox}}.

arcGisService.name: ArcGIS Service Group
arcGisService.invalidServerMessage:
An error occurred while invoking the ArcGIS REST service. The server's response does not appear to be a valid ArcGIS REST document.

If you entered the link manually, please verify that the link is correct.

If you did not enter this link manually, this error may indicate that the group you opened is temporarily unavailable or there is a problem with your internet connection. Try opening the group again, and if the problem persists, please report it by sending an email to {{email}}.
arcGisService.groupNotAvailableMessage:
An error occurred while invoking the ArcGIS REST service.

If you entered the link manually, please verify that the link is correct.

This error may also indicate that the server does not support {{cors}} . If this is your server, verify that CORS is enabled and enable it if it is not. If you do not control the server, please contact the administrator of the server and ask them to enable CORS. Or, contact the {{appName}} team by emailing {{email}} and ask us to add this server to the list of non-CORS-supporting servers that may be proxied by {{appName}} itself.

If you did not enter this link manually, this error may indicate that the group you opened is temporarily unavailable or there is a problem with your internet connection. Try opening the group again, and if the problem persists, please report it by sending an email to {{email}}.

If you did not enter this link manually, this error may indicate that the group you opened is temporarily unavailable or there is a problem with your internet connection. Try opening the group again, and if the problem persists, please report it by sending an email to {{email}}.

We'll now switch you to 2D so that you can continue your work. We would appreciate it if you report this error by sending an email to {{email}} with the technical details below. Thank you!

catalog.unsupportedTypeMessage: Unknown catalogue item type: {{type}}. If you are loading your own catalogue, please verify that it is correct. This error may also indicate an attempt to load a newer catalogue file in an older version of {{appName}}.
catalog.unsupportedFileTypeMessage:
This file format is not supported by {{appName}}. Supported file formats include:
  • .geojson
  • .kml, .kmz
  • .csv (in {{link}})
catalog.unsupportedFileTypeMessageII:
This file format is not supported by {{appName}}. Directly supported file formats include:
  • .geojson
  • .kml, .kmz
  • .csv (in {{link}})
File formats supported through the online conversion service include:
  • Shapefile (.zip)
  • MapInfo TAB (.zip)
  • Possibly other {{linkII}}
catalog.getConfirmationMessage:
This file is not directly supported by {{appName}}.

Do you want to try uploading it to the {{appName}} conversion service? This may work for small, zipped Esri Shapefiles or MapInfo TAB files.

geoJson.errorParsingMessage: An error occurred parsing the provided data as JSON.  This may indicate that the file is invalid or that it is not supported by {{appName}}. If you would like assistance or further information, please email us at {{email}}

geoJson.couldNotLoadMessage:
An error occurred while retrieving JSON data from the provided link.

If you entered the link manually, please verify that the link is correct.

This error may also indicate that the server does not support {{cors}}. If this is your server, verify that CORS is enabled and enable it if it is not. If you do not control the server, please contact the administrator of the server and ask them to enable CORS. Or, contact the '{{appName}}' team by emailing {{email}} and ask us to add this server to the list of non-CORS-supporting servers that may be proxied by 'appName' itself.

If you did not enter this link manually, this error may indicate that the data source you're trying to add is temporarily unavailable or there is a problem with your internet connection. Try adding the data source again, and if the problem persists, please report it by sending an email to {{email}}.
geoJson.unsupportedBrowserMessage: Sorry, your web browser does not support the File API, which {{appName}} requires in order to load this dataset.  Please upgrade your web browser.  For the best experience, we recommend the latest versions of {{chrome}} or {{firefox}} or {{internetExplorer}}.

imageryLayer.intervalSupportErrorMessage: Sorry, {{typeName}} ({{type}}) catalog items cannot currently be made time-varying by specifying the "intervals" property.
imageryLayer.accessingBaseMapErrorMessage:
An error occurred while attempting to download tiles for base map:

{{name}}

This may indicate that there is a problem with your internet connection, that the base map is temporarily unavailable, or that the base map is invalid. Please select a different base map using the Map button in the top-right corner. Further technical details may be found below.
imageryLayer.accessingCatalogItemErrorMessage:
An error occurred while attempting to download tiles for catalogue item:

{{name}}

This may indicate that there is a problem with your internet connection, that the catalogue item is temporarily unavailable, or that the catalogue item is invalid. The catalogue item has been hidden from the map. You may re-show it in the Now Viewing panel to try again. Further technical details may be found below.
imageryLayer.tileErrorMessage:
The tile with the URL:
{{url}}
 succeeded when loaded with XMLHttpRequest but failed multiple times when loaded directly by Cesium or Leaflet.
 This may indicate that the server is very sensitive to the request headers provided or is simply unreliable.
imageryLayer.unknownTileErrorMessage:
While accessing URL:
{{url}}
This probably indicates one of the following:
* The server hostname could not be resolved,
* The server did not respond to the request, or
* The server denied Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) access to this URL (See https://docs.terria.io/guide/connecting-to-data/cross-origin-resource-sharing/).
imageryLayer.unableToDisplayMessage: {{name}} cannot be shown in 2D because it does not support the standard Web Mercator (EPSG:3857) projection. Please switch to 3D if it is supported on your system, update the dataset to support the projection, or use a different dataset.
imageryLayer.unableToShowLocTitle: Unable to show at this location
imageryLayer.unableToShowLocMessage: {{name}} cannot be shown at this location because the available capture times are unknown. The {{featureTimesProperty}} property was not found.

magda.notCompatibleMessageI: The MAGDA dataset does not have a distribution with the ID {{distributionId}} or it does not have a supported format.
magda.notCompatibleMessageII: The MAGDA dataset does not have any distributions with a supported format.

ogr.name: Sconosciuto / Conversione in GeoJSON
ogr.legacyBrowserMessage: Il browser non supporta il formato "FormData" , richiesto dal servizio di conversione di '{{appName}}'. Raccomandiamo di aggiornareil browser all'ultima versione di {{chrome}}, {{firefox}}, {{safari}} o {{internetExplorer}}.
ogr.loadError: Il file pesa più di {{maxConversionSizeMB}} MB, il limite del servizio di conversione usato da {{appName}}
ogr.invalidFile: File invalido o non supportato dal servizio di conversione usato da {{appName}}.
ogr.errorConvertingToGeoJsonMessage: Errore nel tentativo di convertire il file in formato GeoJson.
ogr.emailUs: Per assistenza o informazioni è possibile inviare un'email a {{email}}

placesLikeMe.regionsLikeThisDescription: Identifies regions that are _most like_ a given region according to a given set of characteristics.
placesLikeMe.regionTypeDescription: The type of region to analyze.
placesLikeMe.regionDescription: The region to analyze.  The analysis will determine which regions are most similar to this one.
placesLikeMe.characteristicsDescription: The region characteristics to include in the analysis.
placesLikeMe.name: Places Like Me
placesLikeMe.likenessesError: The list of likenesses and the list of region codes do not contain the same number of elements.

raiseError.errorMessage: {{appName}} ha avuto un errore. Segnalare l'accaduto inviando un email a {{email}}. Altri dettagli possono essere trovati sotto.

regionMapping.noDataForDate: No data for the selected date.
regionMapping.noDataForRegion: No data for the selected region.
regionMapping.outdatedBrowserMessage: You are using a very old web browser that cannot display "region mapped" datasets such as this one.  Please upgrade to the latest version of Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Microsoft Internet Explorer 11, or Apple Safari as soon as possible.  Please contact us at {{email}} if you have any concerns.
regionMapping.invalidServerTypeMessage: Expected serverType to be "WMS" or "vector" but got "{{serverType}}"
regionMapping.msg: Consult the {{link}} to see how to format the file.

feedback.unableToSendMessage: This is really embarrassing, but an error occurred while attempting to send your feedback.  Please email it to {{email}} instead.

sensorObservationService.alreadyLoadingMessage: Your data is still loading. You will be able to change the display once it has loaded
sensorObservationService.unknownError: The server reported an unknown error.
sensorObservationService.missingBody: The server responded with missing body.
sensorObservationService.noFeatures: There are no features matching your query.
sensorObservationService.unknownFormat: The server responded with an unknown feature format.
sensorObservationService.noMatchingFeatures: The Sensor Observation Service did not return any features matching your query.

time.invalidInitialTimeSource: Invalid initialTimeSource specified in config file: {{initialTimeSource}}

shareData.generateErrorMessage: Qualcosa è andato storto col servizio di abbreviazione degli URL. Se pensi sia un bug di {{appName}}, segnalalo con un email a {{email}}.
shareData.expandErrorMessage: Il servizio di condivisione usato da {{appName}} non è stato trovato. Questo può indicare un errore nel link o che il servizio è irraggiungibile in questo momento. Se pensi sia un bug di {{appName}}, segnalalo con un email a {{email}}.

socrataServer.name: Socrata Server
socrataServer.retrieveErrorMessage:
Couldn't retrieve packages from this Socrata server.

If you entered the URL manually, please double-check it.

Otherwise, if reloading doesn't fix it, please report the problem by sending an email to {{email}} with the technical details below. Thank you!

 {{formatError}}

spatialDetailing.name: Spatial Detailing
spatialDetailing.description: Predicts the characteristics of fine-grained regions by learning and exploiting correlations of coarse-grained data with Census characteristics.
spatialDetailing.regionTypeToPredictDescription: The type of region for which to predict characteristics.
spatialDetailing.coarseDataRegionTypeDescription: The type of region with which the coarse-grained input characteristics are associated.
spatialDetailing.aggregationDescription: Specifies how coarse region values were aggregated.  True if the value is the mean of the values across the region, or False if the value is the sum of the values across the region.
spatialDetailing.aggregationTrueDescription: Coarse region values are the mean of samples in the region.  For example, average household income.
spatialDetailing.aggregationFalseDescription: Coarse region values are the sum of samples in the region.  For example, total population.
spatialDetailing.characteristicToPredictDescription: The characteristic to predict for each region.
spatialDetailing.wrongNumberOfElements: The list of values and the list of region codes do not contain the same number of elements

tableData.unsupportedCharactersTitle: Invalid characters in latitude and longitude columns
tableData.unsupportedCharactersMessage: Could not interpret latitude and longitude pair {{longitude}}, {{latitude}}
tableData.bulkGeocoderInfoMessage: The CSV contains addresses, but {{number}} can't be located on the map:
tableData.bulkGeocoderInfo2Message: {{nullAddresses}} addresses are missing from the CSV.
tableData.bulkGeocoderErrorMessage: Unable to map addresses to lat-long coordinates, as an error occurred while retrieving address coordinates. Please check your internet connection or try again later.

terrainCatalog.notSupportedErrorMessage: {{name}} non può essere rappresentato in 2D. Tornare alla modalità 3D.

terria.initErrorMessage: Problema nel server di Terria. Questo può far si che layer o servizi siano inutilizzabili.
terria.urlLoadErrorTitle: Problema nel caricamento di un URL
terria.urlLoadErrorMessage: Problema nell'inizializzazione di Terria con i parametri specificati.
terria.loadingInitSourceErrorTitle: Errore nel caricamento dei dati di inizializzazione
terria.loadingInitSourceErrorMessage: Caricamento da {{fragment}} fallito perchè nessun initFragmentPaths è stato definito.
terria.loadingInitSourceError2Message: Errore nel caricamento da {{loadSource}}. Questo potrebbe essere dovuto ad un link errato o a problemi della connessione internet.

terriaJSONcatalog.misconfiguredError2Message: HTTP 202 configuration {{url}} not present in response {{xhr}}

terriaJSONcatalog.asyncResultDescription: This is the result of invoking the {{name}} process or service at {{timestamp}} with the input parameters below.
terriaJSONcatalog.loadingInitSourceErrorMessage: Error loading initialization source {{fragment}} because no initFragmentPaths are defined.
terriaJSONcatalog.loadingInitSourceError2Message: An error occurred while loading initialization information from {{loadSource}}. This may indicate that you followed an invalid link or that there is a problem with your Internet connection.

userDrawing.clickToAddAnotherPoint: Clicca per aggiungere un altro punto

webFeatureServiceCatalogGroup.invalidWFSServerMessage:
An error occurred while invoking GetCapabilities on the WFS server. The server's response does not appear to be a valid GetCapabilities document.

If you entered the link manually, please verify that the link is correct.

If you did not enter this link manually, this error may indicate that the group you opened is temporarily unavailable or there is a problem with your internet connection. Try opening the group again, and if the problem persists, please report it by sending an email to {{email}}.
webFeatureServiceCatalogGroup.groupNotAvailableMessage:
An error occurred while invoking GetCapabilities on the WFS server.

If you entered the link manually, please verify that the link is correct.

This error may also indicate that the server does not support CORS. If this is your server, verify that CORS is enabled and enable it if it is not. If you do not control the server, please contact the administrator of the server and ask them to enable CORS. Or, contact the '{{appName}}' Map team by emailing {{email}} and ask us to add this server to the list of non-CORS-supporting servers that may be proxied by '{{appName}}' itself.

If you did not enter this link manually, this error may indicate that the group you opened is temporarily unavailable or there is a problem with your internet connection. Try opening the group again, and if the problem persists, please report it by sending an email to {{email}}.

webMapServiceCatalogItem.noLayerFoundMessage: The WMS dataset '{{name}}' has no layers matching '{{layers}}'. {{suggested}} {{line}}{{line}}Either the catalog file has been set up incorrectly, or the WMS server has changed.{{line}}{{line}}Please report this error by sending an email to {{email}}.
webMapServiceCatalogItem.datasetScaleErrorTitle: Dataset will not be shown at this scale
webMapServiceCatalogItem.datasetScaleErrorMessage: The {{name}} dataset will not be shown when zoomed in this close to the map because the data custodian has indicated that the data is not intended or suitable for display at this scale.  Click the dataset's Info button on the Now Viewing tab for more information about the dataset and the data custodian.
webMapServiceCatalogItem.badlyFormatedMessage: The '{{name}}' dataset has a badly formed periodicity, '{{isoSegments}}'. Click the dataset's Info button for more information about the dataset and the data custodian.
webMapServiceCatalogItem.missingDataMessage: The WMS dataset '{{name}}' did not return any data.{{line}}{{line}}Either the catalog file has been set up incorrectly, or the server address has changed.{{line}}{{line}}Please report this error by emailing {{email}}.

webProcessingService.invalidWPSServerMessage:
An error occurred while invoking DescribeProcess on the WPS server for process name {{name}}. The server's response does not appear to be a valid DescribeProcess document.

This error may also indicate that the processing server you specified is temporarily unavailable or there is a problem with your internet connection. Try opening the processing server again, and if the problem persists, please report it by sending an email to {{email}}.
webProcessingService.processDescriptionErrorTitle: Process does not have a process description
webProcessingService.processDescriptionErrorMessage: The WPS DescribeProcess for this process does not include a ProcessDescription.
webProcessingService.processInputErrorTitle: Process does not have any inputs
webProcessingService.processInputErrorMessage: This WPS process does not specify any inputs.
webProcessingService.unsupportedParameterErrorMessage: The parameter {{identifier}} is not a supported type of parameter.
webProcessingService.invalidResponseErrorMessage:
An error occurred while accessing the status location on the WPS server for process name {{name}}. The server's response does not appear to be a valid ExecuteResponse document.

This error may also indicate that the processing server you specified is temporarily unavailable or there is a problem with your internet connection. If the problem persists, please report it by sending an email to {{email}}.
webProcessingService.invalidResponseError2Message: The response from the WPS server does not include a Status element.
webProcessingService.failureReasonUnknowError: The reason for failure is unknown.
webProcessingService.asyncShortReportFailed: Web Processing Service invocation failed.  More details are available on the Info panel.
webProcessingService.resultPendingDescription: This is the result of invoking the {{name}} process or service at {{timestamp}} with the input parameters below.
webProcessingService.regionTypeDescription: The type of region to analyze.
